customer_name: Richard L Miller D V M, P A

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 pm on
02-Mar-17.
Licensee was contacted via telephone, but was not available. No other representative was available for a routine
inspection at the time.
